thread.section_title: FlightHub Reviews | Customer Service Reviews of FlightHub | flighthub.com | 8 of 1722
thread.title: Melanie

author: Melanie
title: Melanie
text: From looking for flights with the exact days and times I needed to actually booking, FlightHub made my experience extremely simple. They had so many flight options available and even gave me the option to reserve seats for a minimal fee so my friends and I can sit together on our flights! And when it came to booking, it was simply adding names, birth dates and credit card information. I'm very happy with my experience!
